rows.label: bf06220170_0010
rows.name:
Whoa...It's just like a big 
version of Kamekichi

rows.label: bf06220170_0030
rows.name:
It's the same, like, Divine Beast-type as Invidia.
Normally it's submerged in the Cloud Sea.

rows.label: bf06220170_0040
rows.name:
Even in early fall, it can get pretty cold
inside Luxuria. Mind you don't freeze!

rows.label: bf06220170_0050
rows.name: I really don't like the cold~

rows.label: bf06220170_0060
rows.name:
I can provide some warmth
So you can stay close to me if you want.

rows.label: bf06220170_0080
rows.name: You guys are pretty handy to have around.

rows.label: bf06220170_0110
rows.name:
Turtle-chan, aren't you cold 
dressed like that?

rows.label: bf06220170_0130
rows.name: He's naturally dense, it's good insulation.

rows.label: bf06220170_0150
rows.name:
Stop encouraging her!
Don't play along!
